articles.title: Trump faces ‘black swan’ threat to the economy and reelection
articles.description: Even Trump‘s leading allies acknowledge the deadly virus could present an existential political threat for the president in an election year.
articles.content:
The view in the White House is that this is one of those classic black swan events, and all we can do is control the health issues in the U.S., said Stephen Moore, an informal economic adviser to the Trump team.
